EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Innovate Through Extreme Automation - 12.4.2013.invite blast 1 - all N
EmailTemplate.subject: [Analyst Webinar] Innovate Through Extreme Automation with voke, inc.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Analyst Webinar: Innovate Through Extreme Automation
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
It’s a new and complex age for enterprises. Software is everywhere and unavoidable. Every company is in some respect a software company, and customers expect software to perform flawlessly. When it doesn't, the brand suffers.
Join Wolfgang Platz, Founder and CPO, Tricentis, and Theresa Lanowitz, Founder, voke, inc., as they discuss how Global 2000 companies can:
- Protect their brand using extreme automation - Drive testing innovation with 8 key factors - Deliver on cost, quality, and schedule with the right innovation framework - Follow the best practices of other companies that have delivered using extreme automation
The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-innovate-through-extreme-automation.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-innovate-through-extreme-automation.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal> Wed. December 4, 2013
1:00pm – 2:00pm EST
Theresa Lanowitz
Founder, voke, inc.
Wolfgang Platz
Founder & Chief Product Officer, Tricentis
